>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/dbc-pool/submit"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Execute the signed transaction, and optionally upload content and header image

:::note
Refer to [Studio API doc](/docs/studio-api) for more information
:::


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["transaction","owner"],"properties":{"transaction":{"type":"string","description":"- Base64-encoded signed transaction\n"},"owner":{"type":"string","description":"- Owner wallet public key\n"},"content":{"type":"string","description":"- Optional content description\n","nullable":true},"headerImage":{"type":"string","format":"binary","description":"- Optional header image file\n"}},"title":"SubmitDBCTransactionRequestBody"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"boolean"},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"mint":{"type":"string"},"configKey":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"errors":{"type":"object"},"error":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
